channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mattress & sheets dumped, 10th July
item.description:
Mattress & sheets dumped behind apple trees on butterfield green path adjacent to shakespeare walk adventure playground, have been there for some time now
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Prince George Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The bike storage in Barley Court is full of abandoned bikes, 10th July
item.description:
The eastern bike storage is full of abandoned bikes which should be identified and removed to free up space for those who actually cycle!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Casbeard Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dustbins, 10th July
item.description:
Since our collection day Tuesday 2 large bins have been left on the pavement and was not returned to their original place 1 from another road. Causing a danger to pedestrian next to small garage near East bank
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Linthorpe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter in Alleyway, 10th July
item.description:
Lots of litter, cans and broken glass in alleyway between Stoke Newington Church Street and Oldfield Road / Painsthorpe Road

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Painsthorpe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish still in my garden waste bin, 10th July
item.description:
On Monday I reported: "Bags of rubbish have been dumped in my garden waste bin, for Flat 15 on the 72 Grove Lane estate. The bin is located behind the noticeboard on Grove Lane.", listed under ref: 7822919. I'm told it has been "fixed" and it is thus closed. It has not been fixed and the bin is still full of flytipped waste.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, Grove Lane, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead Fox in garden, 10th July
item.description:
There is a dead fox at no 6 Edenbridge Road. The carcas is rotting and beginning to smell. And flies are beginning to appear. The neighbours are away on holiday. But access can be obtained over my garden wall
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Edenbridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead Squirrel in road, 10th July
item.description:
Dead squirrel in road. Been there for a few hours now. RIP.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tower Road, Northumberland Heath, London

20 bin bags were dumped this afternoon

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maple Court, North End, London

item.title: Litter, 10th July
item.description:
I reported that there was a great deal of litter in footpath 118 off Station road and 120 off Ridge way. Number was 7812615.i received notification that it had been completed but on checking, footpath 120 had been cleaned but footpath 118 is still really bad with gas canisters, clothing, nappies, old electrical appliances, it has not been cleaned at all and has just got worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridge Way, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress, boxes and clothes flytipped, 10th July
item.description:
See above

item.title: Borough need to attend to cut overhanging trees on sensors, 10th July
item.description:
Checked SD2 intermittent comms with RP due to overhanging trees, SD3 no comms with stud recut required Borough need to attend to cut overhanging trees on sensors
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Horseferry Road, Millbank, London

item.title: Tree watering required, 10th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Green, Hayes, London

item.title: Cut hedges!!!!!!, 10th July
item.description:
Overgrown. Second time reporting. Whole pathway needs cutting it is VERY dangerous and will cause a accident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Iron Mill Lane, Crayford, London

item.title: Bush overgrown and blocking traffic visibility, 10th July
item.description:
A bush has grown huge and makes crossing that bit of the pavement dangerous as can't see cars coming round the corner. The same issue when driving. It needs to be removed sadly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Bagshot Street, Old Kent Road, London

item.title: Mould overtaking fkat, 10th July
item.description:
Mould has been taking over our flat and my partner has asthma, landlord just keep wiping it away and ignoring us. It’s gotten so bad it’s growing into my bed and my landlord is refusing to do anything

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tyssen Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Branch obstucting road, 10th July
item.description:
Branch has fallen off tree and is obstructing the road - concern for road users and it stretches almost across to the other side of pavement. Cars will have to go on the pavement to pass
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodlands Road, Bickley, London
